forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 10C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 4C. NNW winds shifting to ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 40F. NNW winds shifting to ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 38F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
